text: The University of North Texas is a public university in Denton, Texas. The university has 40,796 students as of 2020. It was founded in 1890. The current president of the university is Neal Smatresk. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Mean Green. They have 18 varsity teams and they compete in the American Athletic Conference. ==Other websites== *University of North Texas' Official website *North Texas Mean Green's Official athletics website Category:American Athletic Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Texas Category:1890 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in Texas Category:Denton, Texas
title: University of North Texas
